trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There was one other sighting in Denver on or around January 5th 2007
Summary: came out of north,hoverd,had 4 lights i could see,loss of time,rippled water
divs: Sighting Detailsi was sleeping and heard a humming sound,it got louder and i rolled onto my left side and saw a round craft approach and hover,i stood up and saw 4 bright lights 2 on top and 2 on the bottom.the light wasnt blinking and they was red on top blue on bottom,another person saw this and was coming over a fence and said for him to stay put,and he drove off.i looked at my watch when i stood up and when the craft shot upwards i looked again and 30 minutes had gone by.i cannot account for about 15 minutes.
